column3: â€œBlue OG gives early hints of a sickeningly-sweet scent of diluted jet fuel that turns into robust growth with progressive skunk undertones the further into flowering you go. After 8 weeks of flowering, Blue OG can be cut and put into curing. If you can go 9-10 weeks of flowering, the plant will continue to grow and amaze you with its late growth. Blue OG has a deep sea-green color to its buds once broken apart, which...â€

â€œUnbelievable strain absolutely one of the best strains I have smoked totally top shelf; great smell, very blueberry smell very sweet citrusy with a hint of hash from the OG KUSH. Taste is about the same as the smell citrusy blueberry defiantly sweet a hint of hash. Very smooth burns very clean when grown organically and flushed adequately. Very easy to clone grows very quickly huge side branch buds if trimmed properl...â€

â€œThis is a serious creeper so go slow. The full effects didn't kick in for almost an hour and the high lasted a LONG time.

Blue OG is an indica dominant hybrid. It smells fruity and tastes fruity. It's a really smooth smoke with just a touch of OG flavor to it but mostly fruity. The weird thing (and by weird I mean totally awesome) was the high. I tried this on a pain level day of 9 (which means I was nauseous/vomiti...â€

â€œBlue OG: for me, this was a vibrant and sharp ride of dualistic worlds where I would feel happy, light, creative mind's eye, and then if I relaxed into it, then I would feel it change like a light switch, flip, heavy-limbed, relaxed, and soft into the floor. Switching back and forth every 5-15 minutes for a great 2 hour trip. I would like to try this one with a giant blank canvas in front of me, lots of paint, and al...â€
â€œThis is the kind of weed that you can smoke all day long. It releives anxiety and doesn't make you paranoid at all.â€

â€œGood afternoon medication! this strain feels like a 50/50 after the first bong rip. spacey, stoney, and surprisingly heady. since this has OG lineage I expected full in couchlock. so far there is a bit of couch lock but mostly spacey stoney head floaty-ness! perfectly relaxing, not racy or upitty" at all. perfect for after work medication
column4: or lazy weekend stoney-ness. I will most definitely get this strain again!â€"

column3: â€œThis shit hit me like lightening. I haven't seen bud grown this well in too many years. Not sure about others, but this strain was awesome. I give all thanks to the grower who took the time to do this one right. Shit is heavy. Smoke a lot and you will be taking a nap.â€
â€œVaporizes nice and smooth. Hits you quickly with a mellow heavy body buzz. Decent strain for day or night.â€

â€œBlue OG is a very niche strain in that it is a hybrid but it feels like a pure, strong indica. I go to class high most of the time and the weed I smoke before usually doesn't matter, but this stuff will knock you on your ass. Don't plan on doing anything for at least 4 hours. Great before bed.â€
â€œI love this! I got it from Green Meadows!  Doesn't give you the munchies :). Very creative mind and very happy high!â€

â€œThis is a incredible strain. I would only recommend this to the potheads thatâ€™s can handle a pressure high. The flavor is sweet and the bud smokes so smooth. I plan on using the strain of weed as frequent as I can. The high creeps but settles your body and head. The bud will make you relax and increased my appetite.â€
â€œVery heady, but quality, not drowsy, but focused and relaxed and clear.  very smooth.â€

â€œI enjoy this hybrid because it's 60% indica which is great, It has the sativa effect without the anxiety. It's the perfect day smoke. Grocery shopping, cleaning, hiking, or washing the car. It doesn't make you tired, just makes you calm and chill. Would definitely get it again!â€
â€œGreat flavor!â€

â€œThis strain was produced by the Wasatch Seed Co by selecting a male Bubba OG, (pre bubba 98 x Og kush) x ( bubba kush) and a very potent fragrant Blueberry female to create this flower that looks like it was dipped in sugar. A very high calyx to leaf ratio, medium yields indoor and large outdoor and grows just like a christmas tree. Users cannot get enough of this flower constantly wanting more and loving the fruity ...â€
â€œA delicious smoke that relieves pain and anxiety without making you sleepy.â€

â€œMy recent G13 Blue OG harvest has given me the best yield to date and my new all time fav, so happy I've kept clones! I had no small buds anywere on this plant, all lovely and dense buds with a diverse range of bright colours. The smoke is berries, white widow and a hint of blueberrys. Very...â€

â€œReally good strain if you like the cerebral effects from OG but also like the effects of the blueberry. Nice fruity smell and Excellent strain to relax and take the migraines away. column3: â€œwonderful smell and taste. It provided superb chronic pain relief. I would compare my pain relief to my experience with GSC strain but with a lighter high.  I experience dry eyes and dry mouth.â€
